verses.text: The \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w*; and the \w firmament|strong="H7549"\w* sheweth \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w handywork|strong="H4639"\w*.

\w Day|strong="H3117"\w* unto \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w uttereth|strong="H5042"\w* \w speech|strong="H0562"\w*, and \w night|strong="H3915"\w* unto \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w sheweth|strong="H2331"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

\add There is\add* no \w speech|strong="H0562"\w* nor \w language|strong="H1697"\w*, \add where\add* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* is not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.\f + \fr 19.3 \ft whereâ€¦: or, without these their voice is heard: Heb. without their voice heard\f*

Their \w line|strong="H6957"\w* is gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* through all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and their \w words|strong="H4405"\w* to the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*. In them hath he \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* for the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*,\f + \fr 19.4 \ft line: or, rule, or, direction\f*

Which \add is\add* as a \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w* coming \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of his \w chamber|strong="H2646"\w*, \add and\add* \w rejoiceth|strong="H7797"\w* as a strong \w man|strong="H1368"\w* to \w run|strong="H7323"\w* a \w race|strong="H0734"\w*.

His going \w forth|strong="H4161"\w* \add is\add* from the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and his \w circuit|strong="H8622"\w* unto the \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of it: and there is nothing \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* from the \w heat|strong="H2535"\w* thereof.

The \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w*, \w converting|strong="H7725"\w* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w sure|strong="H0539"\w*, making \w wise|strong="H2449"\w* the \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*.  +  r 19.7  t law: or, doctrine *  +  r 19.7  t converting: or, restoring *

The \w statutes|strong="H6490"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add are\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w*, \w rejoicing|strong="H8055"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w pure|strong="H1249"\w*, \w enlightening|strong="H0215"\w* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

The \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*, \w enduring|strong="H5975"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add are\add* \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \add and\add* \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w* \w altogether|strong="H3162"\w*.  +  r 19.9  t true: Heb. truth *

More to be \w desired|strong="H2530"\w* \add are they\add* than \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, yea, than \w much|strong="H7227"\w* fine \w gold|strong="H6337"\w*: \w sweeter|strong="H4966"\w* also than \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* and the \w honeycomb|strong="H5317"\w*.\f + \fr 19.10 \ft the honeycomb: Heb. the dropping of honeycombs\f*

Moreover by them is thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w warned|strong="H2094"\w*: \add and\add* in \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* of them \add there is\add* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w reward|strong="H6118"\w*.
Who can \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \add his\add* \w errors|strong="H7691"\w*? \w cleanse|strong="H5352"\w* thou me from \w secret|strong="H5641"\w* \add faults\add*.

Keep \w back|strong="H2820"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* also from \w presumptuous|strong="H2086"\w* \add sins;\add* let them not have \w dominion|strong="H4910"\w* over me: then shall I be \w upright|strong="H8552"\w*, and I shall be \w innocent|strong="H5352"\w* from the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*.\f + \fr 19.13 \ft the great: or, much\f*

Let the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and the \w meditation|strong="H1902"\w* of my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, be \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, my \w strength|strong="H6697"\w*, and my \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*.\f + \fr 19.14 \ft strength: Heb. rock\f*
